title: jeremypwr

content: Please note that this Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of Sportsbet.io sponsored Football Pools @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461024.0Premier LeagueLa LigaSerie A Bundesliga Wednesday, 25 October  Champions League- Group stage 3Prediction Contest!Oddshttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/international-clubs/uefa-champions-league/newcastle-united-v-borussia-dortmund-651e6381b3c69600011e3f07Rulesa.  Predict the winner (1x2) (Newcastle, Dortmund or Draw)(must get correct to proceed)b.  Predict the Final score (1x2)  (must get correct to proceed)c.  First team to score? (Newcastle, Dortmund or None)(must get correct to proceed)d.  Most corners? (Newcastle, Dortmund or Same) (must get correct to proceed)e.  Goals scored in both halves? (Yes or No)   (must get correct to proceed)f.  Team to receive most cards? (Newcastle, Dortmund or Same) (must get correct to proceed)g. Team with highest possession %? (Newcastle, Dortmund or Same)  (must get correct to proceed)h.  Tiebreaker:  Predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)Examplea. Newcastleb. 2-1c. Dortmundd. Newcastlee. Yes  f. Sameg. Dortmundh. 25'Prizes1st place:  3 mBTC Free Bet + Southampton shirt 2nd place:  2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place:  1 mBTC Free Bet* Limit one (1) Southampton shirt per person/season *(Small print)* Tiebreaker will include a 10 minute handicap for quicker prediction *Example 1:  20' = 20' - 30'Example 2:  50' = 50' - 60'
